name: The Cake is ALIVE (Shroudy Software)
description:
Welcome to the Iris Enrichment Center testing facility!

As a valued employee, we'll ensure that  you're rewarded on completion of the testing.  The agreement you signed covers accidental loss of life , so you're covered!

Iris EC R&D Notes:

[Controls]
Move - WASD
Look - Mouse 
Portal (Blue) - Right Click  
Portal(Red) - Left Click 
Pick Up - E Key
Settings - ESC Key

Not recommended for ultra-widescreen (playable, not ideal) - resolution can be changed in settings.

[Playtime / Difficulty]
10min - 20min  (varies)
